LanguageData.RetractableWall.label: retractable wall
LanguageData.RetractableWall.description: A wall that can be lowered below ground.
LanguageData.LoweredWall.label: lowered wall
LanguageData.LoweredWall.description: A wall below ground that can be raised to the surface.
LanguageData.UtilityConsole.label: utility console
LanguageData.UtilityConsole.description: Allows control over submersible walls connected to the power grid.
LanguageData.ClosedGate.label: closed gate
LanguageData.ClosedGate.description: A closed impassable heavy gate that requires a lot of work to open and close.
LanguageData.OpenGate.label: opened gate
LanguageData.OpenGate.description: An opened impassable heavy gate that requires a lot of work to open and close.
LanguageData.ClosedPortcullis.label: closed portcullis
LanguageData.ClosedPortcullis.description: A closed impassable heavy portcullis that requires a lot of work to open but swift to close.
LanguageData.OpenPortcullis.label: open portcullis
LanguageData.OpenPortcullis.description: An open impassable heavy portcullis that requires a lot of work to open but swift to close.
